channel.title: Black mesa source requirements
channel.description: I CAN'T WAIT FOR ITTTTTT :'( :'( :'( :'( :'( :fffuuu: but i don't have any source game on my steam account except hl2:dm but i don't think it full this requirement for this Mod I AM a big fan of HALF LIFE Games but sadly i don't have them original on steam so if someone have a copy of half life 2 or any source game please donate to me i don't have money i live in country that steam games are so damn costly i live in europe in country that is not so power full with money (sorry for my english) i know you are working hard for this mod for that all years but i am asking someone that have one source game to gift me please if half life 2 deathmatch not fill the requirement I WANT TO PLAY HALF LIFE AGAIN BUT WITH MORE POWERFUL Graphics :3 gordon :freeman: 4 LIFE ^_^^_^^_^
